name: Preventive Maintenance V02
description: A checklist for preventive maintenance of a telecommunication site

sections.sectionDescription: Check the physical condition of all equipment. Look for signs of damage, wear and tear, or potential failure.
Test the performance of all systems. Ensure they are operating within acceptable parameters and meeting performance standards.
Assess the quality of the signal being transmitted and received. Check for any interference or signal loss.
Check the status of power supply units. Ensure they are functioning properly and providing adequate power.
Inspect the site for any security breaches. Check the integrity of locks, alarms, and surveillance systems.
Clean the site and equipment. Remove any dust, debris, or foreign objects that could interfere with operation.
